name: Humans n aliens (LDJam 43)
description:
This game is for the LDJam 43 (Sacrifices must be made theme) and this is my submission. This is also my first solo developed game. I also don't know how to submit games to the Ludum Dare website so if anyone could help that would be great thanks.

Also Construct 3 stopped working so I guess the game is done now lol.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim 

Lmb:Shoot

In this game enemies get more difficult when left alive for to long (Basic enemies if left for hours will be nearly invincible) So try to take care of them quickly. However you also gain hidden buffs as you put more bags (From the humans) on the yellow drop point.
